mods.li: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decor

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="VFEPD_BarrelGreen" or defName="VFEPD_BarrelGrey" or defName="VFEPD_BarrelRed" or defName="VFEPD_BarrelYellow" or defName="VFEPD_BarrelBlue"]

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_BarrelGreen
ThingDef.label: green barrel
ThingDef.description: A green metal barrel used for secure mass storage.

ThingDef.label: grey barrel
ThingDef.description: A grey metal barrel used for secure mass storage.

ThingDef.label: red barrel
ThingDef.description: A red metal barrel used for secure mass storage.

ThingDef.label: yellow barrel
ThingDef.description: A yellow metal barrel used for secure mass storage.

ThingDef.label: blue barrel
ThingDef.description: A blue metal barrel used for secure mass storage.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="VFEPD_WoodenBookshelf" or defName="VFEPD_SilverBookshelf" or defName="VFEPD_PlasteelBookshelf" or defName="VFEPD_SteelBookshelf"]

ThingDef.label: bookshelf
ThingDef.description: A bookshelf capable of holding a variety of books, tomes and publications.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_WineRack
ThingDef.label: bottle rack
ThingDef.description: A civilized bottle storage rack.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_CardboardBoxLarge
ThingDef.label: large cardboard box
ThingDef.description: A large cardboard box. It can hold light contents. Cheaper than a wooden box.

ThingDef.label: small cardboard box
ThingDef.description: A small cardboard box. It can hold light contents. Cheaper than a wooden box.

ThingDef.label: pallet with cardboard boxes
ThingDef.description: A large pallet with several cardboard boxes.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="VFEPD_ContainerGreen" or defName="VFEPD_ContainerGrey" or defName="VFEPD_ContainerRed" or defName="VFEPD_ContainerYellow" or defName="VFEPD_ContainerBlue"]

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_ContainerGreen
ThingDef.label: green cargo container
ThingDef.description: A green metal cargo container, similar to a skip. Passable. Cannot hold roof.

ThingDef.label: grey cargo container
ThingDef.description: A grey metal cargo container, similar to a skip. Impassable. Cannot hold roof.

ThingDef.label: red cargo container
ThingDef.description: A red metal cargo container, similar to a skip. Impassable. Cannot hold roof.

ThingDef.label: yellow cargo container
ThingDef.description: A yellow metal cargo container, similar to a skip. Impassable. Cannot hold roof.

ThingDef.label: blue cargo container
ThingDef.description: A blue metal cargo container, similar to a skip. Impassable. Cannot hold roof.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_ConcreteBags
ThingDef.label: storage bags
ThingDef.description: A stack of storage bags. Can hold loose materials. Items stored here will not deteriorate.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_HayBaleSmall
ThingDef.label: small hay bale
ThingDef.description: A small block of hay.

ThingDef.label: medium hay bale
ThingDef.description: A medium block of hay.

ThingDef.label: large hay bale
ThingDef.description: A large roll of hay.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_Lockers
ThingDef.label: lockers
ThingDef.description: A metal locker unit, can store heavier clothing than a clothing rack.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_ArmorStandEmpty
ThingDef.label: armor stand empty
ThingDef.description: An armor stand. It can store apparel. Items stored can deteriorate

ThingDef.label: armor stand full
ThingDef.description: An armor stand. It can store apparel. Items stored here will not be visible but will deteriorate

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_WoodenChest
ThingDef.label: wooden chest
ThingDef.description: A medium size wooden chest for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.label: large wooden box
ThingDef.description: A large size wooden chest for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_WeaponRackEmpty
ThingDef.label: weapon rack empty
ThingDef.description: A long weapon rack. It can store weapons. Items stored here can deteriorate

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_WeaponRackSwords
ThingDef.label: weapon rack swords
ThingDef.description: A long weapon rack. It can store weapons. Items stored here will not be visible but can deteriorate.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_Pallet
ThingDef.label: large pallet
ThingDef.description: A large pallet. Does not protect against the weather. Sometimes difficult to manage, but useful nonetheless.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="VFEPD_PalletBarrelGreen" or defName="VFEPD_PalletBarrelGrey" or defName="VFEPD_PalletBarrelRed" or defName="VFEPD_PalletBarrelYellow" or defName="VFEPD_PalletBarrelBlue"]

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_PalletBarrelGreen
ThingDef.label: pallet with green barrels
ThingDef.description: Green metal barrels on a wooden pallet used for secure mass storage.

ThingDef.label: pallet with grey barrels
ThingDef.description: Grey metal barrels on a wooden pallet used for secure mass storage.

ThingDef.label: pallet with red barrels
ThingDef.description: Red metal barrels on a wooden pallet used for secure mass storage.

ThingDef.label: pallet with yellow barrels
ThingDef.description: Yellow metal barrels on a wooden pallet used for secure mass storage.

ThingDef.label: pallet with blue barrels
ThingDef.description: Blue metal barrels on a wooden pallet used for secure mass storage.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_BrickPile
ThingDef.label: brick pile
ThingDef.description: A pile of bricks.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="VFEPD_SpacerContainer" or defName="VFEPD_SpacerContainerLarge" or defName="VFEPD_SpacerContainerStack" or defName="VFEPD_SpacerStorage"]

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_SpacerContainer
ThingDef.label: spacer container
ThingDef.description: A medium sized, triple sealed, password protected box.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_SpacerContainerLarge
ThingDef.label: spacer container large
ThingDef.description: A large sized, triple sealed, password protected box.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_SpacerContainerStack
ThingDef.label: spacer container stack
ThingDef.description: A large stack of different sized, triple sealed, password protected boxes.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_SpacerStorage
ThingDef.label: advanced storage device
ThingDef.description: A large, multi-chamber advanced storage device.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="VFEPD_SteelTallCabinet" or defName="VFEPD_PlasteelTallCabinet" or defName="VFEPD_SilverTallCabinet" or defName="VFEPD_WoodenTallCabinet"]

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_TallCabinet
ThingDef.label: tall cabbinet
ThingDef.description: A tall cabinet. Can hold food, drugs and medicine. Better than a food basket.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="VFEPD_SteelVendingMachine" or defName="VFEPD_PlasteelVendingMachine" or defName="VFEPD_SilverVendingMachine" or defName="VFEPD_WoodenVendingMachine"]

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_VendingMachine
ThingDef.label: vending machine
ThingDef.description: A vending machine. You can store food and drugs here. Your pawns refuse to pay for using it, though.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_WoodenWagon
ThingDef.label: wooden wagon
ThingDef.description: A large stationary wagon. Can hold various things.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_WarehouseShelfEmpty
ThingDef.label: warehouse shelf
ThingDef.description: An impassable warehouse shelf. Can store a lot of things, so long as they are not loose.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_WarehouseShelfBoxes
ThingDef.label: warehouse shelf with boxes
ThingDef.description: An impassable warehouse shelf. Can store a lot of things. It can take a while to take and store items from such a tall structure. Items here will not deteriorate, even if outside.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_BoxLarge
ThingDef.label: large wooden box
ThingDef.description: A large wooden box that can hold various content.

ThingDef.label: small wooden box
ThingDef.description: A small wooden box that can hold various content.

ThingDef.label: pallet with wooden boxes
ThingDef.description: A large pallet with several wooden boxes.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_WoodenLogs
ThingDef.label: wooden logs
ThingDef.description: A small, passable stack of wooden logs.

ThingDef.label: large wooden logs
ThingDef.description: A large, impassable stack of wooden logs.

mods.li: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decor

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_WaterTank
ThingDef.label: water tank
ThingDef.description: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. If the contained water becomes contaminated, the tank must be drained. Pawns can wash their hands and drink (if thirst is enabled) from this building.

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_WaterDispenser
ThingDef.label: water dispenser
ThingDef.description: A large, standing fresh water dispenser used for drinking.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="VFEPD_BucketWater" or defName="VFEPD_WashingMachine" or defName="VFEPD_WaterDispenser" or defName="VFEPD_WaterTank"]

mods.li: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decor
Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decor

ThingDef.Name: DZ_VFEPD_Fridge
ThingDef.label: fridge
ThingDef.description: A fridge cabinet. Can hold food and freeze it. Easier to build and use than a deep fridge.

mods.li: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decor
Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Props and Decor

ThingDef.label: cooker
ThingDef.description: A cooker unit for heating up food.

ThingDef.label: oven
ThingDef.description: A large oven for heating up food.
